ComicInfo.Summary:
Can't Get Up In The Morning: Ozzy The Ocelot recommends a hearty bowl of "Fruitful Flakes" to cure a couple's sexual dysfunction.
Amy And The New Shoes: On her way home from the market, Amy finds a bundle with a new pair of sandals inside.
Closing Time At A Topless Bar: One of the dancers at Lee's Totally Topless Night Spot makes a remarkable discovery.
Choices: The Mink helps Patrick square things with his fiance.
The Fuzz: Detective Kasschmecker and Sergeant Handbit search a sleaze strip club for criminal activity.
